column1: #Text=The scene was not exactly new to me .

#Text=Moved by the spirit of adventure , or by an access of ennui which overtakes me at times , I had several times visited the gaudy establishment of Mercer , on the fashionable side of Fifth Avenue in the Fifties .
#Text=In either case I had found disappointment ; where the stake is a matter of indifference there can be no excitement ; and besides , I had been always in luck .
#Text=But on this occasion I had a real purpose before me , though not an important one , and I surrendered my hat and coat to the servant at the door with a feeling of satisfaction .
#Text=At the entrance to the main room I met Bob Garforth , leaving .
#Text=There was a scowl on his face and his hand trembled as he held it forth to take mine .

#Text=What a rotten hole ,  said he , and passed on .

column1: #Text=I made my way to the center wheel and stood at the rear of the crowd surrounding it .
#Text=The ball rolled ; there was a straining of necks amid an intense silence ; then , as the little pellet wavered and finally came to a rest in the hole number twenty-four
#Text=a fervent oath of disappointment came from some one in front of me .
#Text=The next moment , rising on tiptoe to look over the intervening shoulders , I found myself looking into the white face of my younger brother Harry .
#Text=" Paul ! " he exclaimed , turning quickly away .
#Text=I pushed my way through and stood at his side .
#Text=There was no sound from the group of onlookers ; it is not to be wondered at if they hesitated to offend Paul Lamar .
#Text=" My dear boy , " said I , " I missed you at dinner .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=For Heaven 's sake , Paul , let me alone ,  he said , hardly above a whisper .

column1: #Text=" But you are making a show of yourself .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= But I say I have lost ninety thousand dollars , " said the boy , and there was wildness in his eye .

column1: #Text=His mouth was drawn tight and his eyes glared sullenly as those of a stubborn child .
#Text=Clearly it was impossible to get him away without making a scene , which was unthinkable .
#Text=For a moment I was at a complete loss ;
#Text=then the croupier 's voice sounded suddenly in my ear :
#Text=I silenced him with a glance and turned to my brother , having decided in an instant on the only possible course .
#Text=" Here , let me have your chair .
